name: Cats Commit Café Chaos
description:
This is a submission for the Northern Ireland Student Game Jam 2022 [Theme: Lift].
Created in 2.5 days by "Anxious Pixel Bread" a Team of 4 (NRC - Newtownabbey).

Story:

Tim the programmer has set up his very own cat café! his friend and co-worker Jonny has accidently spilled the catnip all over the floor and the cats have gone wild!

They have hired your help to collect the cats around the café and bring them to the customers, to lift their spirits!

Tim is trying to record one of his YouTube tutorial videos so he needs you to be extra quick in delivering those cats!

How To Play:

Walk around the café using W A S D.

Move the camera using the Mouse.

Lift (Pickup) cats by walking near them.

Place cats by walking to the chairs that have pink pillows.

Each cat you place into the chairs will give you 1 point.

You have two minutes to score as many points before the timer resets along with your score, try and get the highest score possible!
